name: Vroomgo the Robot Vacuum
description:
Do you have what it takes to be the ultimate robot vacuum cleaner Vroomgo? Can you leave no dust trail behind?

Use arrow keys to turn robot, release to move. Z to speed up.

On mobile, tap where you want robot to go. Sorry for choppy framerate!

Made for Mini Jam. I may update it in future.

Background music is from Royalty-Free Legacy Music Pack (by Forgotten Dawn).

SFX & fanfares by Mubsi

Glass-breaking sound from Fesliyan Studios
